knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
N <- 6
n <- 2
pop <- 1:N
rs <- expand.grid(Draw1 = pop, Draw2 = pop) #gives all possible random samples
xbarN <- apply(rs, 1, mean)
s2N <- apply(rs, 1, var)

RSV <- cbind(rs, xbarN = xbarN, s2N = s2N)
head(RSV, n = 3)

fractions(xtabs(~xbarN)/36)
fractions(xtabs(~s2N)/36)
```
